meteringPoint.description: Unique metering point id for this reading.

connectionId.description: Connection ID from the EP application, which uses it to associate consumption records with EP user.

dataNeedId.description: The data need id that was used to request this consumption record.

permissionId.description: The Persmission ID associates a ConsumptionRecord with a consent. It is unique per consent.

startDateTime.description: Start date and time of this consumption record in ISO-8601 format.

meteringInterval.description: Interval of the readings. Use ISO-8601 duration notation.

consumption.description: Energy consumed during this interval in Wh.

meteringType.description: Type of the reading, as supplied by the MDA.
